sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
Gospel-repentance floweth from faith, and attendeth a iustified person all his dayes. Whereunto is added, the difference between the lavv and the Gospel. Written by Francis Cornwell, a minister and servant of Iesus, the Christ, for the benefit of poor distressed consciences in city, countrey, and campe. Cornwell, Francis.
[14], 108 p.
Printed by John Dawson, London : 1645.
Running title reads: The difference between legall and evangelicall repentance. Annotation on Thomason copy: "Aug. 23". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
